chapterTitle: Review, Defend, and Iterate the Design
chapterDescription: Practice design defense under critique, integrating feedback, and improving the proposal without losing coherence.

options: pivot architecture quickly and postpone revalidating against original goals

acknowledge critique and restate constraints before revising
problems.explanation: In A scenario of experiment assignment service surfaced this issue: the dominant concern is defensive posture when assumptions are challenged under aggressive latency targets, "acknowledge critique and restate constraints before revising" is strongest because it directly mitigates defensive posture when assumptions are challenged under aggressive latency targets for Review, Defend, and Iterate the Design.
problems.detailedExplanation: In real systems, choose moves that reduce uncertainty and operational risk at the same time. For related security-design decisions, justify the first intervention by risk-reduction speed, blast-radius containment, and operational cost. Also name one residual risk and one post-rollout verification signal to show operational depth.
